title: Facing Forward, Hand in Hand
body: This advent calendar begins at the end because this year has asked us to stop hiding behind beginnings and explanations. Starting in reverse feels honest. What matters now is not how long we have loved each other, but how deliberately we choose to be here, in this moment, with everything that is still unfinished. I love you very much. I am scared sometimes, and unsure, and still here. I am grateful that we are counting down to the new year together, holding what we have with care, and facing whatever comes next without turning away.
